price: 28. Sidaasi waxaa ugu wacan waxay raaceen waxa Alle ka cadheysiiya, naceenna waxa raalli geliya. Markaasuu buriyey acmaashooda.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ ٱتَّبَعُواْ مَآ أَسۡخَطَ ٱللَّهَ وَكَرِهُواْ رِضۡوَٰنَهُۥ فَأَحۡبَطَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahumu ittabaʿū mā askhaṭa al-laha wakarihū riḍ'wānahu fa-aḥbaṭa aʿmālahum
